title: Kissin' cousins
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/City and town life
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Real estate development
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/City and town life
description: Elvis Presley plays a dual role in this film - Airforce Lieutenant Josh Morgan, and a countrified Jody Tatum. Morgan is sent by the Government on the unenviable job of trying to secure hillbilly land for a proposed missile base. Much to Morgan's surprise he is faced with a blonde, country version of himself which means double the songs and women. Cast also includes Arthur O'Connell, Glenda Farrell, Jack Albertson and Pam Austin. Includes the following songs; "Kissin cousins", "Barefoot ballad" and "Tender feeling".
